0.user_question: Cynthia eats one serving of ice cream every night.  She buys cartons of ice cream with 15 servings of ice cream per carton at a cost of $4571604 per carton.  After 60 days, how much will she spend on ice cream?

ost_step.1: Cynthia consumes 1 serving each day for 60 days, so that’s 1 * 60 = 60 servings needed.
ost_step.2: Each carton contains 15 servings, therefore she needs 60 / 15 = 4 cartons.
ost_step.3: One carton costs $4571604; thus, four cartons would cost 4 * $4571604 = $18286416.
